Willing able tumour biopsy take screen second tumour biopsy take lapatinib/placebo administration . Male female ≥18 year age . Haemoglobin ≥9gm/dL ( 5mmol/L ) . Aspartate ( AST ) alanine transaminase ( ALT ) less three time upper limit normal range ( ULN ) . Total bilirubin ≤2.0 mg/dL .
